facebook.title: Bangalore's largest portal for booze deals is hiring. Apply Now!
facebook.description: Check out the open positions, and if you find one that suits you, send us an email to getgulped@vgulp.com, stating a little something about yourself, and why you would like to join us. Spread the word.
